hotels.title: Hamilton Waikato Riverside Hotel with Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Wander colourful Hamilton, New Zealand's fourth largest city, from this elegant riverside hotel. Perfectly positioned on the banks of the Waikato River, this hotel offers easy access to the city's best attractions. Pay a visit to the nearby Hamilton Gardens, a sensory feast of themed gardens from around the world, or explore the local dining scene, with the hotel's own Alma Eatery serving up modern New Zealand cuisine. For a slice of local culture, visit the Waikato Museum, just a short walk away.
